moduleMetadataJson.name: Multi Gather Resolve Hosts
moduleMetadataJson.description: Resolves hostnames to either IPv4 or IPv6 addresses from the perspective of the remote host.
author: Ben Campbell <eat_meatballs@hotmail.co.uk>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: HOSTNAMES
options.description: Comma separated list of hostnames to resolve.

options.name: HOSTFILE
options.description: Line separated file with hostnames to resolve.
